verses.verse: כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> behold הַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> For behold the day בָּ֔א <S%H935><s%> cometh בֹּעֵ֖ר <S%H1197><s%> that shall burn כַּתַּנּ֑וּר <S%H8574><s%> as an oven וְהָי֨וּ <S%H1961><s%> become כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all זֵדִ֜ים <S%H2086><s%> and all the proud וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every עֹשֵׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> yea and all that do רִשְׁעָה֙ <S%H7564><s%> wickedly קַ֔שׁ <S%H7179><s%> shall be stubble וְלִהַ֨ט <S%H3857><s%> shall burn them up אֹתָ֜ם <S%H853><s%> הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> and the day הַבָּ֗א <S%H935><s%> that cometh אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> so לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> neither יַעֲזֹ֥ב <S%H5800><s%> that it shall leave לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like שֹׁ֥רֶשׁ <S%H8328><s%> them neither root וְעָנָֽף׃ <S%H6057><s%> nor branch

וְזָרְחָ֨ה <S%H2224><s%> arise לָכֶ֜ם יִרְאֵ֤י <S%H3373><s%> But unto you that fear שְׁמִי֙ <S%H8034><s%> my name שֶׁ֣מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> shall the Sun צְדָקָ֔ה <S%H6666><s%> of righteousness וּמַרְפֵּ֖א <S%H4832><s%> with healing בִּכְנָפֶ֑יהָ <S%H3671><s%> in his wings וִֽיצָאתֶ֥ם <S%H3318><s%> and ye shall go forth וּפִשְׁתֶּ֖ם <S%H6335><s%> and grow up כְּעֶגְלֵ֥י <S%H5695><s%> as calves מַרְבֵּֽק׃ <S%H4770><s%> of the stall

וְעַסּוֹתֶ֣ם <S%H6072><s%> And ye shall tread down רְשָׁעִ֔ים <S%H7563><s%> the wicked כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יִהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become אֵ֔פֶר <S%H665><s%> for they shall be ashes תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> under כַּפּ֣וֹת <S%H3709><s%> under the soles רַגְלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H7272><s%> of your feet בַּיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> in the day אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am עֹשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> that I shall do אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> [this] saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts פ

זִכְר֕וּ <S%H2142><s%> Remember תּוֹרַ֖ת <S%H8451><s%> ye the law מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses עַבְדִּ֑י <S%H5650><s%> my servant אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which צִוִּ֨יתִי <S%H6680><s%> which I commanded אוֹת֤וֹ <S%H853><s%> בְחֹרֵב֙ <S%H2722><s%> unto him in Horeb עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> for all Israel חֻקִּ֖ים <S%H2706><s%> [with] the statutes וּמִשְׁפָּטִֽים׃ <S%H4941><s%> and judgments

הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I שֹׁלֵ֣חַ <S%H7971><s%> Behold I will send לָכֶ֔ם אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> אֵלִיָּ֣ה <S%H452><s%> you Elijah הַנָּבִ֑יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet לִפְנֵ֗י <S%H6440><s%> before בּ֚וֹא <S%H935><s%> the coming י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> of the great וְהַנּוֹרָֽא׃ <S%H3372><s%> and dreadful

וְהֵשִׁ֤יב <S%H7725><s%> And he shall turn לֵב־ <S%H3820><s%> the heart אָבוֹת֙ <S%H1><s%> of the fathers עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto בָּנִ֔ים <S%H1121><s%> to the children וְלֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> and the heart בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto אֲבוֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> to their fathers פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> so אָב֕וֹא <S%H935><s%> lest I come וְהִכֵּיתִ֥י <S%H5221><s%> and smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth חֵֽרֶם׃ <S%H2764><s%> with a curse
